tool.name: Beagle4.0
tool.description: Beagle version 4.0 performs genotype calling, genotype phasing, imputation of ungenotyped markers, and identity-by-descent segment detection.

param.name: refSelect
param.label: Select to use a reference or to estimate phasing

param.name: ref
param.label: Reference file
param.help: ref=[file] specifies a reference VCF file containing additional samples and phased genotypes for each marker. See also the impute parameter.

param.name: gtORglSelect
param.label: Select genotype or genotype likelihood input file
param.help: Either file option requires VCF format

param.name: gtgl
param.label: GT file
param.help: gt=[file] specifies a VCF file containing a GT (genotype) format field for each marker.

param.name: gtgl
param.label: GL file
param.help: gl=[file] specifies a VCF file containing a GL or PL (genotype likelihood) format field for each marker. If both GL and PL format fields are present for a sample, the GL format will be used. See also the maxlr parameter.
